description:
The goal of this course is teaching to people how to develop an effective and efficient GOOGLE ADSENSE PROGRAM in order to MAXIMIZE REVENUES. The secrects explained are related to many different aspects, from the ads position to the prevention from account deactivation.

The variety and the depth of the topic make it affordable BY EVERY person, skilled SEO strategists, newbies of the web or simple bloggers that would like to boost their web revenues.

The language is quite easy and can be understood also from people who are not english/american mother tongue.

The structure of the course is divided into the dualism between VIDEO lessons and BONUS textual lessons. The bonus lessons enhance the level of the general knowledge deeping the topics into their most inner secrets.

In conclusion, following this course, students will be able to understand a very important piece of the ADSENSE world (and of other Google's tools too), and, at the end, they will be able to set the correct strategy to program and predict stable revenues..

ABOUT MIKE, the VOICE: Mike is an audiobook narrator and producer with super rates and service provision (85 + fully edited and produced audio hours of experience with voiceover). Mike has a lot of experience also in the field of recording lessons for university and high school classrooms, and he has taught different topics on many different platforms.
title: Master Passive Incomes - Develop Google Adsense Strategies
